pullrequest.title: [Gazebo9] Enabling dynamic linking for Windows build

content.raw:
this causes a linking error our Ubuntu builds with gcc:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none&build=1019)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1019/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1019/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=774)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/774/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/774/

~~~
libgazebo_gui.so.9.6.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::common::EnumIface<gazebo::common::MaterialType>::names'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
~~~
content.html:
this causes a linking error our Ubuntu builds with gcc:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1019/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/774/
libgazebo_gui.so.9.6.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::common::EnumIface<gazebo::common::MaterialType>::names'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
